author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Bipartisan senators call on China to close all wet markets
description: A bipartisan group of senators called on Chinese officials to close all wet markets in the country over their suspected links to the coronavirus outbreak. The letter, spearheaded by Sens....
content:
A bipartisan group of senators called on Chinese officials to close all wet markets in the country over their suspected links to the coronavirus outbreak. 
The letter, spearheaded by Sens. Lindsey GrahamLindsey Olin GrahamTrump attacks WHO amid criticism of … [+2543 chars]
